subject: Baseball
Amnesties, Commutations and Pardons
Campaign Finance
lead_paragraph: George Steinbrenner cooperated on national security cases and was willing to let the F.B.I. stage an organized-crime raid at Yankee Stadium, according to documents released Monday.
snippet: George Steinbrenner cooperated on national security cases and was willing to let the F.B.I. stage an organized-crime raid at Yankee Stadium, according to documents released Monday.
